mapper.insert: insert into hz_classroom (resource_id, room_name, sn, group_count, computer_count, computer_count_free, school_area_id, building_id, floor_id, lab_type_id, floor_space, description, sort, create_time, creator_id, creator_name, last_update_time, updator_id, updator_name, is_delete, course_type_ids ) values (#{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{computerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{computerCountFree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{schoolAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floorSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseTypeIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update hz_classroom set room_name = #{roomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_count = #{groupCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, computer_count = #{computerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, computer_count_free = #{computerCountFree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, school_area_id = #{schoolAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, building_id = #{buildingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, floor_id = #{floorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lab_type_id = #{labTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, floor_space = #{floorSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updator_id = #{updatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updator_name = #{updatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, course_type_ids = #{courseTypeIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select resource_id, room_name, sn, group_count, computer_count, computer_count_free, school_area_id, building_id, floor_id, lab_type_id, floor_space, description, sort, create_time, creator_id, creator_name, last_update_time, updator_id, updator_name, is_delete, course_type_ids from hz_classroom where resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select resource_id, room_name, sn, group_count, computer_count, computer_count_free, school_area_id, building_id, floor_id, lab_type_id, floor_space, description, sort, create_time, creator_id, creator_name, last_update_time, updator_id, updator_name, is_delete, course_type_ids from hz_classroom
